Achievements.Condition: abl:AXE >= 25 && abl:BLN >= 25 && abl:LBL >= 25 && abl:POL >= 25 && abl:SBL >= 25 && abl:LAR >= 25 && abl:HAR >= 25
Achievements.Title: Jack of All Trades
Achievements.Description: Train all abilities to level 25 with a single character

Achievements.Condition: abl:AXE >= 50 && abl:BLN >= 50 && abl:LBL >= 50 && abl:POL >= 50 && abl:SBL >= 50 && abl:LAR >= 50 && abl:HAR >= 50
Achievements.Title: Queen of All Trades
Achievements.Description: Train all abilities to level 50 with a single character

Achievements.Condition: abl:AXE >= 75 && abl:BLN >= 75 && abl:LBL >= 75 && abl:POL >= 75 && abl:SBL >= 75 && abl:LAR >= 75 && abl:HAR >= 75
Achievements.Title: King of All Trades
Achievements.Description: Train all abilities to level 75 with a single character

Achievements.Condition: abl:AXE >= 100 && abl:BLN >= 100 && abl:LBL >= 100 && abl:POL >= 100 && abl:SBL >= 100 && abl:LAR >= 100 && abl:HAR >= 100

Achievements.Description: Train all abilities to level 100 with a single character

Achievements.Description: Reach level 50 without ever raising an armor ability or losing a fight

Achievements.Condition: Level >= 15 && abl:AXE <= 10 && abl:BLN <= 10 && abl:LBL <= 10 && abl:POL <= 10 && abl:SBL <= 10
Achievements.Title: Boxer
Achievements.Description: Reach level 15 without ever raising a weapon ability

Achievements.Condition: dng:LIGHTHOUSE > 0 && abl:AXE <= 10 && abl:BLN <= 10 && abl:LBL <= 10 && abl:POL <= 10 && abl:SBL <= 10
Achievements.Title: I Am The Greatest!
Achievements.Description: Complete the Lighthouse without ever raising a weapon ability or losing a fight

Achievements.Condition: Level >= 50 && abl:AXE <= 10 && abl:BLN <= 10 && abl:LBL <= 10 && abl:POL <= 10 && abl:SBL <= 10
Achievements.Title: Path of the Monk
Achievements.Description: Reach level 50 without ever raising a weapon ability or losing a fight

Achievements.Condition: Wilderness >= 75 && abl:AXE <= 10 && abl:BLN <= 10 && abl:LBL <= 10 && abl:POL <= 10 && abl:SBL <= 10 && abl:LAR <= 10 && abl:HAR <= 10 && Losses == 0
Achievements.Title: The Paths Converge
Achievements.Description: Defeat a level 75 enemy in the wilderness without raising any ability or losing a fight
